subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module is used to store in cache a selection of attributes of the Front Office user. A Lutece user event listener triggers the storage of data at login event.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: The list of the attributes to store must be set in properties.
The property must have the prefix "mylutece-cacheuserattribute.attributeIds." and should end with the name of the lutece user attribute.
The value of the property is the id of the attribute that will be stored.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: The user attributes stored in cache are provided by the CacheuserattributeService class.
